description: Two ex-aides of Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman are among 20 on trial in absentia for the killing.
title: Jamal Khashoggi murder: Trial of 20 Saudis in absentia resumes in Turkey
title_page: Jamal Khashoggi murder: Trial of 20 Saudis in absentia resumes in Turkey - BBC News
maintext: According to interviews conducted by Ms Callamard, their lawyers argued at the Saudi trial that they were state employees and could not object to the orders of their superiors, and that Mr Asiri insisted that he never authorised the use of force to bring Khashoggi back to Saudi Arabia.
